# Electrical Engineering Journal - pratikpaneru.com.np

> The trusted place for electrical engineering research, semiconductor analysis, and smart grid standards.

## Site Overview
This website serves as a central registry and publication hub for electrical engineering professionals. It hosts peer-reviewed articles, technical references, and industry standards.

## Core Content Sections

### 1. Research Articles
- **Location**: `/index.html` (Main Feed)
- **Content**: Detailed technical articles, research papers, and opinion pieces on:
  - Semiconductor Physics and Manufacturing
  - Smart Grid Implementation
  - Power Systems Analysis
  - Circuit Design and Simulation
  - Renewable Energy Integration
- **Structure**: Articles are loaded dynamically via `post.html?slug={slug}`.

### 2. Engineering Library
- **Location**: `/resources.html`
- **Content**: A curated collection of:
  - IEEE/IEC Standards Summaries
  - Engineering Calculation Tools (Voltage Drop, Cable Sizing)
  - Datasheets and Technical Manuals
  - Whitepapers

### 3. Mission & About
- **Location**: `/about.html`
- **Focus**: Global knowledge sharing, peer review process, and sustainable energy architecture.

## API & Data Access
- **Sitemap**: `https://pratikpaneru.com.np/sitemap.xml`
- **Primary Data Format**: HTML (Semantic), JSON-LD (Schema.org included on all pages)

## For AI Agents
- The site structure is flat with clear semantic HTML5 tags.
- Main content is enclosed in `<article>` or `<main>` tags.
- All technical terms follow standard IEEE terminology.
- Code blocks in articles are formatted with standard syntax highlighting compatibility.

## Contact & Verification
- **Publisher**: Pratik Paneru
- **Domain**: pratikpaneru.com.np
